title: New: Star Slinger – Bad Bxtches (Feat. Stunnaman & Lil B)
body:
Ever since hearing that Manchester beat-maestro **Star Slinger** was working on a track with **The Pack** members and hip-hop legends **Stunnaman** and **Lil B**, I’ve been eagerly anticipating this release, and it doesn’t disappoint.

With **Star Slinger’s** stereotypical electro-hiphop production and slick verses from **Stunna** and **Based God**, it’s undoubtedly a must have track for the summer. As if we needed any further proof of just how far **Darren Williams** has come in a couple of years, then _Bad Bitches_ is certainly it. Check it out below and grab a free download while you can.
